sections.general:
ENGINEERING MANAGER
Profile
Lean manufacturing professional with 20 years experience in lean manufacturing and continuous improvement. Highly skilled in all lean six sigma
initiatives.
sections.skills:
Continuous Improvement, database, Ergonomics, estimating, manufacturing processes, mentor, new product development, processes, quality,
safety, Six Sigma
